    • Class gameobject.Component extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

      serialVersionUID:
      -8483226362985916744L

      • Serialized Fields

        • parent

          Gameobject parent
          This is a reference to the gameobject using the component

          boolean intialized

        • destroyed

          boolean destroyed
          has the component been removed from it's parent or has the parent been destroyed

  • Package physics

    • Class physics.Collider extends Component implements Serializable

      serialVersionUID:
      -3988997315667362511L

      • Serialized Fields

        • pos

          Vector pos
          position of the collider(middle) TODO make this final

        • size

          Vector size
          size of the collider TODO make this final

        • velocity

          Vector velocity
          The velocity of the collider TODO make this final

        • layer

          int layer
          The physical layer of the collider

        • sendCollision

          boolean sendCollision
          Can the collider cause collision events

        • receiveCollision

          boolean receiveCollision
          Can the collider receive collision events

        • isBlocking

          boolean isBlocking
          Can other objects pass through the collider
          if on one of the colliders has isBlocking == false the colliders can pass through each other.
          onCollision will still be called

        • isStatic

          boolean isStatic
          can the collider be moved TODO replace this with endless mass after implementing force into physics
